title: The Haunted Effects Pack 2 : Ghost Voices
longDescription:
While you take a look at this pack, also check our similar pack HERE

Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


Introducing The Haunted Effects Pack 2: Ghost Voices – a spine-chilling collection of spectral sound effects crafted with game developers in mind. This comprehensive audio library is teeming with over a 160 recorded and designed vocal sounds that will breathe life—or rather, an eerie afterlife—into your gaming worlds.


Each sound bite in this pack is a haunting echo from the beyond, featuring shrill, eerie vocals that range from blood-curdling screams to guttural roars. The ghostly repertoire includes a variety of screams, shouts, roars, rumblers, and otherworldly expressions, each one as hair-raising as the next.



The Haunted Effects Pack 2: Ghost Voices is your go-to resource for high-quality, terrifying vocal effects that are guaranteed to send shivers down the spines of your players. Unleash the phantoms of sound with this essential sound effects pack and elevate the auditory experience of your next game project.
technicalDetails:
Features: 

Eerie Voice Sound Effects



Number of Audio Waves: 168

Number of Audio Cues: 168

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 KHz 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 16:33

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
